how-to-implement: in meta.json define *extended* with url to this json https://raw.github/example-meta.json

info.url_png_icon_64x64: http(s) url to pool icon; not animated; max 40kb
info.url_png_logo: http(s) url to pool logo; not animated; max 50kb
